media.caption: Arrested students being taken to court.

text.headline:
Sri Lankan Ragging Timeline
(1975 - present)
text.text:
A visualization of major ragging related incidents happened throughout the Sri Lankan university history.



Disclaimer: All of these events are captured from publicly available sources such as news sites, wikis, and articles. I do not investigate the credibility of any of the sources nor events. Thus, there can be false information. Therefore, I welcome any of you to contribute to this project and help to maintain it by removing false information and adding new events.
